ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 20 // with this project. It hashes the repository name and remote to generate a filesystem-safe path.
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 21 func (p *Project) Checksum() string {
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 22 hasher := sha256.New()
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 23 hasher.Write([]byte(p.Name))
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 24 hasher.Write([]byte(p.Remote))
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 25 hash := hasher.Sum(nil)
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 26
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 27 return base64.URLEncoding.EncodeToString(hash)
ccdc9136304bdde745f2ee2a3d4ce972c7bb9e73[Sun, 27 Sep 2020 12:28:57 -0700][Kevin Lin <developer@kevinlin.info>] 28 }
